General.Name: UTair Aviakompaniya OAO
General.Description: Public Joint-Stock Company UTair Aviation provides passenger and cargo transportation services on domestic and international routes. It offers its services through aircraft and helicopters. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is based in Surgut, Russia. Public Joint-Stock Company UTair Aviation operates as a subsidiary of OOO AK-invest.
